entries.meaning: The process of amalgamating; a mixture, merger or consolidation.

definitionGroups.group: The result of amalgamating; a mixture or alloy.

entries.meaning: (specifically) The production of an alloy of mercury and another metal.
(obsolete) The intermarriage and interbreeding of different ethnicities or races. [in the US, supplanted after 1863 by miscegenation; elsewhere, in use into the 1900s]
